nav.div: Mount Sinai School District » Our District » District Information » 2019 Novel Coronavirus (2019-nCoV) Resources

div.div: Important Information Regarding the Coronavirus and School Closures *Updated 4/16/20

strong.strong: Governor Cuomo amended his Executive Order and now we are closed through May 15, 2020.

br.br: Please read the letters below from our building principals:
New York State Education Department’s recently released guidance documents regarding the cancellation of the June 2020 Regents Examinations. Please see the resources below:

a.title: Click here for information
a.span: Notice from the NYS School Boards Association

a.title: Click here for information
a.span: Cancellation of the June 2020 Administration of the NYS High School Regents Examination Program in Response to COVID-19 Related School and District Closures

a.title: Click here for information
a.span: Regents Examination and Graduation Requirements Questions Related to COVID-19 Closure

a.title: Click here for information
a.span: NYS Next Generation Mathematics Learning Standards Instruction and Assessment Implementation Timeline

a.title: Click here for information
a.span: NYS Next Generation ELA Learning Standards Instruction and Assessment Implementation Timeline

img.p:
Governor Cuomo announced that he is extending school closures for an additional two weeks, until April 15. The Executive Order is available by clicking here:
The Board of Regents and Department continue to work on additional guidance and we will provide it to you as soon as it is ready.
Information Regarding Spring Break - 4/1/20
Employee Rights
